description: Procedurally generated dirt texture with brown tones and natural variations

base_colors.note: Updated to match TextureAtlas.java:2105-2107 for actual game blocks

primary_noise.note: Direct frequencies from TextureAtlas.java:2101-2103 - no secondary noise used

generation_algorithm.step1: Generate primary noise: dirtX = sin(x * 0.7 + y * 0.3) * 0.5 + 0.5
generation_algorithm.step2: Generate primary noise: dirtY = cos(x * 0.4 + y * 0.8) * 0.5 + 0.5
generation_algorithm.step4: Apply base colors: r = 135 + dirtNoise * 40, g = 95 + dirtNoise * 35, b = 70 + dirtNoise * 25
generation_algorithm.step5: Apply dark spots at 5x5 and 7x6 pattern coordinates (subtract 30, 25, 20)
generation_algorithm.step6: Clamp all color values to [0, 255] range

metadata.purpose: JSON conversion of actual in-game dirt block texture (not UI background)
metadata.previous_version: 1.0 was based on UIRenderer (incorrect for game blocks)
